name: Dungeon Doodles
description:
Description:

Dungeon crawling rogue-like top-down shooter game (Submission for 7DRL 2022)

Plot:

Lone fighter goes through a dungeon deeper and deeper. But there is no chance to win.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D (or arrow keys) to move
  • Mouse to turn and fire.

Team:

One person. Art by developer... Sorry in advance.

Assets:

  • Code. Most of the game is created in one week. I used some code samples for labyrinth generation and 2d shadows I had before, though.
  • Art. The images are made by me too. I used google results for "doodle" for inspiration.
  • Sound. I used some free sounds found  here and here.

Versions:

  • 1.3 - the latest version, with sounds.
  • 1.2.1 - is the previous version. Just before adding sounds.
